course.subject: ECON
course.name: Econometrics
course.description: Ordinary least squares, multiple regression and maximum likelihood estimation; variable selection and model specification; multicollinearity;  heteroscedasticity and serial correlation;  errors in variables; Endogeneity and instrumental variable regression; panel data model; generalized method of moment.
course.prerequisites: ECON 5100 AND ISOM 5540

reviews.author: starlord
reviews.title: VERY TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!!
reviews.comment_content:
Course Outline:
1. Matrix Algebra and Statistics Review
2. The Classical Linear Regression Model
• Statistical Properties of the Least Squares Estimator
• Hypothesis Testing with the Multiple Regression Model
• Asymptotic Properties of the OLS Estimator
• Model Specification
3. Extensions of the Classical Regression Model
• Heteroskedasticity and Autocorrelation
4. Endogeneity and Instrumental Variable Estimation
5. Generalized Method of Moments
• Generalized Method of Moments
• Hypothesis Testing with GMM
6. Panel Data Models
• Fixed effects Model
• Random Effects Model
7. Clustering Analysis
8. Difference-in-Differences Analysis
9. Additional Topics
reviews.comment_teaching:
Clearly, he does not know how to teach. He keeps jumping lecture notes back and forth and there is no logic in his teaching. He often forgets to record the lecture but always remembers to ask students to turn on their cameras. He will not start the lecture until everyone turns on their cameras. He never replies to students' emails after the class.

The TA Yu Jun needs to learn how to send emails correctly. His email about the final exam somehow goes into the junk box.
reviews.comment_grading: There is no marking scheme. But what can be sure of is that if you want to get a reasonable grade from him, you will be disappointed.
reviews.comment_workload:
He pretended to be an easy person about the assignments, but obviously he failed to do so. The requirement of assignments keeps changing. Initially, we were told we would have a group project. But he changed it to an individual project at the last minute.

The final exam was 3 hrs in the Final Exam Schedule on the university website. He changed it to 2h30min in the last lecture and he again changed it to 2hrs one week before the exam to make sure students do not have enough time to answer all questions.
